resources.string: Ensure the init-script is always installed, even after an Android update.
Check this one in order to uninstall init-script and ensure it won\'t come back. Ever.
Allows LAN to bypass the firewall and Orbot
Caution! Enabling this means *all* your secondary device traffic will go to the wild! That means you may get compromised!
Manage some network options. Beware, you may go insecure!
Caution! This may leads to data leakage as the OS will probe network each time you connect to the Wireless!
Select applications with special rights, like your preferred browser app for Captive Portal authentication, or VoIP.
This browser will be authorized, on request, to bypass Tor in order to connect to a Captive Portal. You can activate the temporary bypass directly from the Menu.
Selected application will see its UDP traffic allowed outside of TOR.
